{"id":531289286,"lang":"cpp","time":"8 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1627774502,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/531289286/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"14.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        int n = height.size();\n        vector<int> pref_max(n+2, (int)-1e9);\n        vector<int> suff_max(n+2, (int)-1e9);\n        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n            pref_max[i+1] = max(pref_max[i], height[i]);\n        }\n        for (int i = n-1; i >= 0; --i) {\n            suff_max[i+1] = max(suff_max[i+2], height[i]);\n        }\n        int ans = 0;\n        for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {\n            ans += min(pref_max[i], suff_max[i]) - height[i-1];\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water"}
